lines.text: Isn't it amazing? We're so bound by customs and rituals. Somebody just has to press my button, this button marked Tradition, and I start responding like a trained monkey. Do I shock you?
There is no word in our language that can describe us. How we feel for each other.
What I saw in the bedroom was a sin in the eyes of God and man.

[in the very beginning of the movie]
What you can't see you can see. You just have to see without looking.

[to Mundu]
Agra is not only famous for the Taj Mahal. It's also famous for it's lunatic asylum. Maybe that's where you'll end up.
